original_title: Former UPFA MP Dayasritha Tissera joins SJB
original_body_lines: Former Parliamentarian of the United People’s Freedom Alliance (UPFA) Dayasritha Tissera has joined the alliance of the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB).
Tissera, who met with Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa, has vowed to support the SJB’s political program.
Furthermore, the Opposition Leader has appointed Tissera as the SJB’s Organizer of the Naththandiya electoral district.
